channel.title: united gamers usa ?
channel.description: hello ! does anyone know if united gamers will open a server in usa ? preferably close to washington pls ? :love: :rolleyes: :thumbsup: i know their servers from hl2dm and i was very happy to see them in black mesa ! they have always been the best performing and configured servers i have seen in hl2dm..i am not even fanboying right now but i've literally [u]never[/u] seen other servers having such a consistent performance when full.. my ping is above 100 on any european server..i would enjoy them more if they were in usa :frowning:

item.title: united gamers usa ?
item.dc:creator: AvoidPaypal
item.description:
Hi,

Thank you for the compliments, we do indeed take performance extremely serious on all our servers & pride ourselves on having the best (or very close) servers available as far as pure performance goes.

There are no plans to open up a server in USA at this time unfortunately, i am sorry.

However, things may change in the future if more people will request this, nothing is written in stone.

Feel free to join our Steam group https://steamcommunity.com/groups/WeAreUnitedGamers for future discussions & general news about our servers.

Good luck !

Read full topic

item.title: united gamers usa ?
item.dc:creator: Jolly50
item.description:
hello !
does anyone know if united gamers will open a server in usa ? preferably close to washington pls ? :love: :rolleyes:
i know their servers from hl2dm and i was very happy to see them in black mesa ! they have always been the best performing and configured servers i have seen in hl2dm…i am not even fanboying right now but i’ve literally never seen other servers having such a consistent performance when full… my ping is above 100 on any european server…i would enjoy them more if they were in usa
